metaTags.metaTitle: Browser Isolation | Protect Users and Data
metaTags.metaDescription: Learn how Cloudflare's Remote Browser Isolation (RBI) secures data and users. Protect against zero-day threats. Deploy with or without a device client.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Cloudflare named in 2024 Gartner Magic Quadrant for SV-SASE. Announcement >

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Browser Isolation
relatedBlades.subtitle: High-performance remote browser isolation (RBI)
relatedBlades.copy: Browser Isolation runs all code at the edge of our global network  insulating users from ransomware, phishing, and zero-day browser vulnerabilities.

streamPosterAssetFile.altText: Browser Isolation Product Page - hero video image thumbnail
streamPosterAssetFile.title: Browser Isolation Product Page - hero video image thumbnail

contentfulAsset.description: Remote browser isolation webinar video thumbnail

columnContent.title: Quickly deploy RBI policies
columnContent.description: Protect sites, SaaS, and self-hosted apps with preset browser isolation policies in the Cloudflare Dashboard.

columnContent.title: Isolate resources conditionally
columnContent.description: Implement RBI by application, by policy, for suspicious sites only, or with additional data loss controls.

columnContent.title: Extend security controls
columnContent.description: Natively integrate RBI with Cloudflare's Zero Trust services, including email security, for a layered security approach.

columnContent.title: Exceed user expectations
columnContent.description: Keep security invisible with innovative RBI and hyper-low latency suitable for everyday browsing.

relatedBlades.title: Extend Zero Trust to Internet browsing
relatedBlades.copy:
Applying [Zero Trust](https://www.cloudflare.com/zero-trust/) to browsing means that no code or interactions should be trusted to run on devices by default.

Unlike legacy RBI methods, our patented technology eliminates security and performance trade-offs and is so fast, it feels just like local browsing.

imageAssetFile.altText: Browser Isolation Product Page  - HOW IT WORKS - diagram
imageAssetFile.title: Browser Isolation Product Page  - HOW IT WORKS - diagram

contentfulAsset.description: Browser Isolation Product Page  - HOW IT WORKS - diagram

relatedBlades.title: Learn how Browser Isolation works within Cloudflare's SASE platform

buttonOne.elementName: Browser Isolation Product Page -  Primary CTA

columnContent.title: Cloudflare named in 2024 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Single-Vendor SASE
columnContent.description: We believe this recognition is a testament to Cloudflare's "light branch, heavy cloud" architecture and its ability to help global, cloud-minded enterprises accelerate their network modernization.

columnContent.title: Cloudflare a Strong Performer in The Forrester Wave: Security Service Edge Solutions, Q1 2024
columnContent.description: Cloudflare received the highest score in the global network criterion. We believe this recognition validates our commitment to build SASE "the right way," converging network and security services on a composable, programmable connectivity cloud.

columnContent.title: Cloudflare named a "Leader" in 2023 KuppingerCole Leadership Compass for SASE
columnContent.description: Through its 2023 SASE market analysis, KuppingerCole Analysts AG cited several Cloudflare strengths such as our large globally distributed presence and sophisticated traffic acceleration, massive backbone capacity, 100% uptime guarantee, and innovative Remote Browser Isolation.

content.value: "We started using Cloudflare Browser Isolation to help provide the best security for our customers' data and protect employees from malware. It worked so well I forgot it was on."

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Browser Isolation runs browser code far away from local devices, helping prevent attacks and deliver a fast, responsive user experience

columnContent.title: Protect against ransomware
columnContent.description: Isolate browsing to block ransomware attacks  before they spread to internal networks.

columnContent.title: Thwart phishing attacks
columnContent.description: Mitigate phishing attempts by opening suspicious email links in an isolated browser.

columnContent.title: Secure third-party access
columnContent.description: Easily contain and protect data that external users access from BYOD or unmanaged devices.

relatedBlades.description: Helping organizations worldwide progress towards Zero Trust
